briefTitle: AI-Assisted System for Accurate Diagnosis and Prognosis of Breast Phyllodes Tumors
officialTitle: Development of an Artificial Intelligence-Based System for Precise Diagnosis and Prognosis of Breast Phyllodes Tumors
conditions: Phyllodes Breast Tumor, Artificial Intelligence, Multiomics, Prognostic Cancer Model, Diagnosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients diagnosed with a phyllodes tumor of the breast

Exclusion Criteria:

* Blurred images, imaging artifacts
